content: - 158 & rage 46 sts * knit 2 rnds/purl 1 round repeat 1 time knit 2 rnds in the very last knit round increase 2 sts - duck egg 48 sts chart 3 *work following lace pattern rnds 1 & 3 k2/p1 - round 2 k2 p1 yo ssk p1 - round 4 k2 p1 k2tog yo p1 - repeat rnds 1-4 one time - repeat rnds 1-3 - watery *work chart 4 in round 1 decrease 3 sts & in round 11 increase 2 sts - pine / avocado / keld 45/47 sts *knit 1 round and place marker after 34th & 39th st right hand or 6th & 11th left hand - skipton *knit 1 round and increase 1 st after first m1r and before second marker m1l purl 1 round knit 1 round repeat last 3 rnds one more time skipton 51 sts *knit 1 round and increase 1 st after first m1r and before second marker m1l knit 2 rnds chart 4 repeat last 3 rnds one more time change color every 2 rnds - rage / dent 55 sts *knit 1 round and increase 1 st after first m1r and before second marker m1l knit 1 round - avocado 57 sts *knit 2 rnds - pine *knit 2 rnds - watery *knit 34 right hand or knit 6 sts left hand remove marker place next 15 sts on scrap yarn to work later remove 2nd marker cast on 3 sts and knit to end of round watery 45 sts *knit 3 more rnds and increase 1 st in last round - watery 46 sts *work chart 5 - duck egg / keld *knit 1 round & work next 6 rnds k1tbol/p1 bind off in pattern - skipton thumb * transfer 8 sts to needle 1 7 sts needle 2 pick up & knit 5 sts with needle 3 - watery 20 sts * knit 3 rnds - watery * work chart 5 - keld / maritime * knit 1 round & k1tbol/p1 for 3 rnds and bind off loosely - skipton chart 5 sew in all loose ends and enjoy the next one if you have any questions or suggestions contact me at celloknits@gmail com
